<Text: Penn & Teller Get Killed:  The duo play themselves, in a satirical account of what the audience would perhaps imagine the pair doing in their daily lives.>

Text: Penn & Teller Get Killed:  Most of the action involves Penn and Teller playing practical jokes on each other along with Penn's girlfriend, Carlotta (Caitlin Clarke).
